attributes.action: Carers should be payed for each person thay care for and at the rate of min wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I care for both my husband and our son thay both have the same genitic disease at the moment i get payed for just my husband, i care for them 15 hours a day at the currant rate of £0.45p an hour this is not even close to the min wage. i'm not asking for the min wage we just want something that is fair and that is paid for each person that is being cared for.
